00033 #define USART_FLOW_CONTROL_NONE 0
00034 #define USART_FLOW_CONTROL_HARDWARE (1 << 0)
00035 #define USART_DTR_CONTROL (1 << 1)
00036 
00037 #if defined(ATMEGA1281) || defined(ATMEGA2561) || defined(ATMEGA1284) || \

00043   #define USART_SPI_WRITE_MODE (1 << 3)
00044 #endif

00049 ******************************************************************************/
00051 typedef struct
00052 {
00055   HalUsartService_t service;
00058   UsartChannel_t tty;
00064   UsartMode_t mode;
00079   UsartBaudRate_t baudrate;
00085   UsartData_t dataLength;
00090   UsartParity_t parity;
00094   UsartStopBits_t stopbits;
00098   UsartEdgeMode_t edge;
00102   UsartClkMode_t syncMode;
00106   uint8_t *rxBuffer;
00108   uint16_t rxBufferLength;
00112   uint8_t *txBuffer;
00114   uint16_t txBufferLength;
00118   void (*rxCallback)(uint16_t);
00121   void (*txCallback)(void);
00122   #if defined(_USE_USART_ERROR_EVENT_)
00123 
00129     void (*errCallback)(UsartErrorReason_t);
00130   #endif
00131 
00136   uint8_t flowControl;
00137 } HAL_UsartDescriptor_t;
